meanings.definition: relating to the development of someone or something
meanings.sent1: The teacher observed the child's developmental milestones.
meanings.sent2: The developmental stages of a butterfly are fascinating.
meanings.sent3: The developmental changes in the plant made it look like it was dancing.
meanings.sent4: Her artistic skills took a developmental leap after attending the workshop.
meanings.sent5: The developmental process of a seed turning into a flower is truly remarkable.

meanings.definition: relating to the growth or maturation of someone or something
meanings.sent1: The doctor monitored the patient's developmental progress.
meanings.sent2: Proper nutrition is crucial for the developmental health of a child.
meanings.sent3: The developmental rate of the puppies surprised their owner.
meanings.sent4: The developmental journey of a caterpillar into a butterfly is a beautiful transformation.
meanings.sent5: The developmental changes in technology have revolutionized communication.

meanings.definition: relating to the progress or advancement of someone or something
meanings.sent1: The company invested in the developmental training of its employees.
meanings.sent2: The developmental improvements in the city's infrastructure were evident.
meanings.sent3: The developmental upgrades to the software made it more user-friendly.
meanings.sent4: The developmental success of the project was celebrated by the team.
meanings.sent5: The developmental goals set by the team were achieved through hard work.
